description: Try our easy to follow Seared Duck With Five-spice & Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Seared Duck With Five-spice & Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 duck breasts, skin on and scored in a crisscross pattern

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the duck breasts in the five-spice paste. Melt the butter in a frying pan over a high heat. Add the duck breasts, skin-side down, and cook for about 10 minutes until the skin is golden and crisp. Carefully pour the fat away from the pan, then turn the breasts over and cook on the other side for a further 8 minutes.

Remove the meat from the pan, cut into slices, and arrange on a warm plate. Pour away any remaining fat, then add the orange juice to the pan along with the sugar. Let it simmer for a minute or two, scraping up any bits from the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.
Add the noodles, and toss them in the sauce for a couple of minutes. Remove from the heat, and stir through the coriander. Serve immediately with the warm duck breasts.
